amendment.description: To modify the time limitation for use of entitlement to educational assistance for reserve component members supporting contingency operations and other operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4342 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4342 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6355) To modify the time limitation for use of entitlement to educational assistance for reserve component members supporting contingency operations and other operations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4342 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4342 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lincoln.
